name: Environment Walkthroughs 19T3
description:
All students were asked to create a set of modular assets and then use those assets, as well as suitable lighting and effects, to build an environment. 

The students were given strict requirements for process and specifications for asset construction but had free reign on the design.

Once completed, these environments were compiled into a single project so they can be experienced together.

Credits:

Karl Eyre,
